item.title: DIS
item.description: score:67 Chances: Entertainment stocks—like TTWO, LYV, and DIS—have been showing signs of life over the past year despite what remains of a challenging macro environment. As the economy shows signs of resilience and consumers have a chance to save a bit more disposable income for enjoyment and experiences, I’d look for the entertainment scene to continue adding to recent momentum.
